title: I need 2 Detroit Old Judge cards buy or trade
author: jcmtiger

posts.post_title: I need 2 Detroit Old Judge cards buy or trade
posts.post_content:
I need these 2 cards to complete the 1887 Detroit Wolverine set of 28 cards.

Ganzel OJ Book # 179-2, 493, Catch at shoulder
Twitchell OJ Book # 468-2, 490, Pitch at chest

These cards are available for trade or will buy.

Ganzel OJ Book # 179-3, 494, bat right shoulder SGC Authentic
Rowe OJ Book # 394-1, 497, bat on shoulder  SGC 20
Clark Griffith HOF OJ Book # 201-5, Pitch right hand head high SGC 35

My references are Jay Miller and Joe Gonsowski, have bought or traded with both. Leon knows who I am also.

Thanks for looking

Joe
